ExecuteLua.code:
for i=0, #data.birdTargets do
XGenAIModule.GetEntityByWUID(data.birdTargets[i]):ResetPosition()
if data.archeryStart.weaponType == enum_shootingContest_weapon.Rifle then XGenAIModule.GetEntityByWUID(data.birdTargets[i]).Properties.Physics.Mass = -1 else XGenAIModule.GetEntityByWUID(data.birdTargets[i]).Properties.Physics.Mass = 0.23 end
end
